description: This file contains implementation of the Monitor class responsible for managing plugin monitoring operations such as setting restart limits, resetting stats, retrieving status, and signaling actions within the WPEFramework Plugin namespace.
external_methods: Register<T1,T2>(const string&, method pointer, class instance)

classes.name: Monitor
classes.description: A class providing monitoring functionalities for plugins, including restart limits, statistics, and status reporting.

methods.name: void RegisterAll()
methods.description: Registers API endpoints and properties for monitoring functions.

methods.name: void UnregisterAll()
methods.description: Unregisters all the API endpoints and properties related to monitoring.

methods.name: uint32_t endpoint_restartlimits(const RestartlimitsParamsData & params)
methods.description: Sets new restart limits for a specified plugin identified by call sign.

methods.name: uint32_t endpoint_resetstats(const ResetstatsParamsData & params,InfoInfo & response)
methods.description: Resets memory and process statistics for a specified plugin.

methods.name: uint32_t get_status(const string & index,Core::JSON::ArrayType<InfoInfo> & response) const
methods.description: Retrieves the current status of a plugin or all plugins being monitored.

methods.name: void event_action(const string & callsign,const string & action,const string & reason)
methods.description: Signals an action event taken by the monitor, including call sign, action, and reason.

ctags.name: endpoint_resetstats
ctags.pattern: /^    uint32_t Monitor::endpoint_resetstats(const ResetstatsParamsData& params, InfoInfo& response/

ctags.name: event_action
ctags.pattern: /^    void Monitor::event_action(const string& callsign, const string& action, const string& reaso/
ctags.signature: (const string & callsign,const string & action,const string & reason)

ctags.name: get_status
ctags.pattern: /^    uint32_t Monitor::get_status(const string& index, Core::JSON::ArrayType<InfoInfo>& response)/
